#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <limits.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int getsum(ll num,int &digits)
{
    int sum=0;
    while(num!=0)
    {
        digits++;
        sum=sum+(num%10);
        num=num/10;
    }
    return sum;
}
int main()
{
    int cases;
    scanf("%d",&cases);
    while(cases--)
    {
        ll n;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        int digit=0;
        getsum(n,digit);
        int lastdigit=(n/pow(10,digit-1))-1;
        int sum=lastdigit+9*(digit-1);
        //cout<<sum<<" ";
        ll ans=0;
        for(ll i=n-sum;i<n;i++)
        {
            int temp=i+getsum(i,lastdigit);
            if(temp==n)
            {
                ans=i;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(ans==0)
        printf("NONE\n");
        else
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
